Indian Economy.title: Focus on MSMEs, domestic manufacturing as Sitharaman holds pre-Budget meet
Indian Economy.summary: At the first pre-Budget consultation for 2026-27, economists suggested that Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman focus on boosting domestic manufacturing, MSMEs, and R&D, while maintaining fiscal discipline and scaling up digital and green investments.

Indian Economy.title: Japan PM Takaichi signals work on new fiscal target
Indian Economy.summary: She said her government would retain the current budget target for now but plans to replace it with a multi-year spending goal, easing Japan’s strict fiscal consolidation stance.

Technology Sector.summary: On July 25, 1997, facing imminent arrest in the fodder scam, Bihar Chief Minister Lalu Prasad Yadav announced that his wife Rabri Devi would be the next chief minister. For Rabri, it was a tectonic shift.

Technology Sector.title: Pallavi Purkayastha murder case: Bombay HC dismisses plea seeking death penalty to security guard, upholds his conviction and life sentence
Technology Sector.summary: A sessions court in Mumbai in July 2014 sentenced the security guard to life imprisonment. The court refused to award him the death penalty, observing that the Pallavi Purkayastha murder case was not “rarest of rare".

Technology Sector.title: Salman Rushdie to be honoured with Dayton peace prize lifetime achievement award
Technology Sector.summary: The prizes honor both literary merit and the writers' promotion of peace through their work, with separate awards annually for fiction, nonfiction and lifetime achievement.
